config_name: Binary Frequency - first meal within 2 hours of waking 3 of 7 days

configuration_json.formula: if (days_meeting_timing >= required_days) then success_value else failure_value

schema.description: SC-BINARY-FREQUENCY: Success requires eating first meal within 2 hours of waking on at least 3 of 7 days per week

metadata.recommendation_text: Eat your first meal of the day within 2 hours of waking at least 3 times a week

analysis.reasoning: SC-BINARY-FREQUENCY: Meal timing is binary (within window or not) with weekly frequency pattern
